title: They're

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player and make them into another player of your choice each night. The first player's name and role will be changed to the second's for the rest of the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have at least one pair of players you made the same win the game.

desc:
Post 2975
*They're an amazing guy, you will love him!*
Roleblock and redirect immune
